og.description: Is the latest Republican alternative to Obamacare a real alternative? Or is it “Obamacare lite”? Are Republicans going to give us a choice? Or merely an echo? Let’s start with first principles. In the best of all possible worlds there would be a complete separation of health and state, just as there [...]
